Section.Catchline: Requirement for insurance coverage or bond.

SectionBody.Text: No person may operate an amusement ride or amusement attraction unless at the time of such operation there is in existence:

Subsection.Text: An insurance policy in an amount of not less than $1 million per occurrence insuring the owner or operator against liability for injury to persons arising out of the use of the amusement ride or amusement attraction; or
A bond in a like amount; however, the aggregate liability of the surety under such bond shall not exceed the face amount thereof.

SectionBody.Text: The policy or bond shall be procured from one or more insurers or sureties licensed to transact business in this state or approved as surplus lines insurers.
